settings.text:
Our Commitment to Accessibility


Unimed International, Inc. is committed to making our websites’ content accessible and user friendly. If you are having difficulty viewing or navigating the content on this website, or notice any content, feature, or functionality that you believe is not accessible to people with disabilities, please email our team at accessibility@unimedint.com with “Accessibility Assistance” in the subject line and provide a description of the specific feature you feel is not accessible or a suggestion for improvement. We value your feedback and will consider it as we continuously ensure that we accommodate all of our users and our accessibility policies. Additionally, while we do not control such vendors, we strongly encourage vendors of third-party digital content to provide content that is accessible and user friendly.

settings.title: Good for you
settings.text: We're cautious of our ingredient selection and use only the best.

settings.title: Made to perform
settings.text: Breakthrough formulas that are designed and tested thoroughly.

settings.title: 100% transparency
settings.text: We never test on animals during any stage of product development.
